comments: Number of permutations of [n+3] with three inversions. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 25 2002This sequence is related to A241765 by A241765(n) = n*a(n) - sum( a(i), i=0..n-1 ), with A241765(0)=0. For example: A241765(4) = 4*49 - (29+15+6+1) = 145. - _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 29 2014
